ComicInfo.Summary:
Tyler Durden is back, looking to chalk up some more conquests. But a new movement has replaced Project Mayhem, and even Tyler doesnt know how to play by these rules.
A strange picture frame provides a glimpse into another world, but it might not be as idyllic as it seems.
Sequel to the 6-month NY Times bestseller.
Chuck Palahniuk & Cameron Stewart reunite.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | David Mack | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Cameron Stewart | 2 | C | Variant Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 3 |
